title: 3dZcat
description: Concatenates datasets in the slice (z) direction

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Use 'pname' for the output dataset prefix name. [default='zcat']

datum.title: Output Datum
datum.description: Coerce the output data to be stored as the given type, which may be byte, short, or float.

fscale.title: Force Scaling
fscale.description: Force scaling of the output to the maximum integer range. This only has effect if the output datum is byte or short (either forced or defaulted). This option is sometimes necessary to eliminate unpleasant truncation artifacts.

nscale.title: No Scaling
nscale.description: Don't do any scaling on output to byte or short datasets. This may be especially useful when operating on mask datasets whose output values are only 0's and 1's.

verb.title: Verbose
verb.description: Print out some verbosity as the program proceeds.

frugal.title: Frugal Memory Usage
frugal.description: Be 'frugal' in the use of memory, at the cost of I/O time. Only needed if the program runs out of memory. Note frugality cannot be combined with NIFTI output
